ygData.subject: Re: Magical Weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: As far as 1hs goes... I have a Demonclaw from the Avatar of Fear that is dmg 5 delay 19 and use a rune sword in the secondary hand.  It seems that I attack
ygData.messageBody:
As far as 1hs goes...
I have a Demonclaw from the Avatar of Fear that is dmg 5 delay 19 and use a
rune sword in the secondary hand. It seems that I attack NON-stop.... It
also seems that I rarely do damage above 14 with the claw and 17 with the
runesword, but when you attack as fast as you do with these 2 weapons who
cares. I also at one point had a babred leather whip to go along with the
demonclaw, that is the best combo i can think of for 1hs... you NEVER stop
attacking with those 2 due to the extrememyl low delays on both weaopns.
The frequency of misses also seems to be higher, tho i believe that is
completely due to the sheer quantity of attacks.

Just some info on weapons for you.

Dyvim Kincaid
Stormriders of Cazic Thule.
